__e: Credit Card is a good option, but there is a 4% fee. Visa, MasterCard, American Express and JCB are accepted
I went to the American Express and sent a cable to my partner:
We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, and PayPal as forms of payment for monthly subscription Plans.​
You can use Visa, MasterCard and American Express cards or send payments with PayPal.
You can pay with credit or debit card from Visa, MasterCard and American Express or use a PayPal Account.
Customers can pay by credit card (Visa, MasterCard or American Express) or by PayPal.
Please note that the hotel does not accept American Express credit cards.
I got 2,000 blank American Express cards, right now.
If you should ever need me for anything... you can always get in touch with me at the American Express in Paris.
Ans.: We accept T/T in advance or L/C at sight.
we welcome new and old customers from all walks of life to contact us for future business relationships ans mutual success!
